name: EmotesAndSpeechBubbles-naclfish
title: Emotes and Speech Bubbles by naclfish
author: naclfish
description:
Make multiplayer communication a bit fancier with player speech bubbles and a basic emote system.
This is the original mod. https://mods.factorio.com/mod/EmotesAndSpeechBubbles 
Thank you Kiplacon for allowing me to modify it and release it.
让玩家可以在游戏内发送一些表情来激怒对手或队友，也可以萌混过关。
这是原始模组。 https://mods.factorio.com/mod/EmotesAndSpeechBubbles 
感谢 Kiplacon 允许我修改并发布我自己的版本。
